q: explain the`` shyster rates.'' In a statement posted at the centre of Chrysler's home page Saturday, Sergio Marchionne said he regrets a term he used and considers it`` inappropriate.'' The Pentagon brass saw no need for any changes.`` The department believes that existing remedies with respect to contractor wrongdoing are sufficient,'' the Report to Congress on Contractor Fraud concluded. It is clear that DOD's current approach is not working and we need far more vigorous enforcement to protect taxpayers from massive fraud, Bernie Sanders said. Under a separate Bernie Sanders provision in another law signed by Barack Obama , a government-wide federal contractor fraud database will be accessible to the public by April 15.
